title: Suttagalli
content: is chetta's milkshake shop still there? visting blr after 4 years.

comments.body: Yes and the man still has the same heart
Unrelated to this post but why did the shawarma dude in the starting of the road decide to change the color of the shawarma from a nice red to something yellowish? Does it still taste good?
